title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla and Watch Dogs Legion are even cheaper than usual in this week's PS5 deals
author: tabitha-baker
article: Ubisoft's next-gen launch games have been at the centre of PS5 game deals for a few months now. However, Assassin's Creed: Valhalla and Watch Dogs: Legion are both seeing some stunning extra discounts this weekend.

These games were already pretty cheap, at $39.99 for Assassin's Creed and $29.99 for Watch Dogs. This weekend's PS5 deals are pushing things even further, though, offering Valhalla for just $29.99 and Legion for $24.99 at Amazon.

We have seen these record low prices once before - during a brief drop earlier in the year. However, these PS5 deals only lasted a day or two before rising back up to their usual sales prices, so we wouldn't wait too long to stock up your library with these discounts.
You'll find both offers just below, as well as plenty more PS5 game deals to check out as well.
Not in the US? Scroll down for more cheap PS5 games in your region.

We're rounding up plenty more cheap game deals across a range of platforms this weekend. However, if you missed out on this week's PS5 restocks we're also showing you how to get your hands on the next-gen console and plenty other PS5 deals as well.
